mapper.select: SELECT product_id, quantity, name, description, use_yn, price, category_id, create_date, modify_date FROM product WHERE product_id=#{productId}

SELECT p.product_id, p.name, p.description, p.price, c.name as categoryName, CONCAT(f.file_id, '.', f.file_type) AS imageUrl, p.create_date FROM product p LEFT OUTER JOIN file f ON p.product_id=f.reference_id AND f.reference_type='PRODUCT_IMG' AND f.use_yn='Y' INNER JOIN category c ON p.category_id =c.category_id WHERE p.product_id=#{productId} AND p.use_yn = 'Y'
SELECT product_id, quantity, name, description, use_yn, price, category_id, create_date, modify_date FROM product WHERE product_id=#{productId} FOR UPDATE;
